item.title: Generating custom raspberry-pi images
item.description: I’ve been working on a number of projects involving my raspberry pi; DSLR timelapse, a pi running dedicated stocks and notifications systems, and a media server. I have a silly approach of solving any critical errors by flashing a new raspbian image to the SD card and continuing as if the error was never made. The approach can be heavily criticized, but I’m not invested in immediately working out the errors; it’s usually something obscure.
